TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListBox extends System.Windows.Forms.ListControl

summary.span: 表示要顯示項目清單的 Windows 控制項。

span.span: Represents a Windows control to display a list of items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項可讓您顯示給使用者，使用者可以按一下選取的項目清單。The control enables you to display a list of items to the user that the user can select by clicking. A控制項可以提供單一或多個選取項目使用屬性。A control can provide single or multiple selections using the property. 也提供，啟用項目的資料行，而不是直接垂直清單中的項目顯示的屬性。The also provides the property to enable the display of items in columns instead of a straight vertical list of items. 與這個項目，此控制項可以顯示更明顯可見的項目，使用者不再需要捲動項目。With this, the control can display more visible items and the user no longer needs to scroll to an item. 一般而言，Windows 控制代碼的繪圖中顯示的項目工作。Typically, Windows handles the task of drawing the items to display in the . 您可以使用屬性，並控制代碼和事件，因此您可以覆寫繪製 Windows 自動提供，並自行繪製項目。You can use the property, and handle the and events so you can override the automatic drawing that Windows provides and draw the items yourself. 您可以使用主控描繪控制項以顯示在清單中的變動高度項目、 影像或不同的色彩或每個項目的文字字型。You can use owner-drawn controls to display variable-height items, images, or a different color or font for the text of each item in the list. 屬性， ，和也可協助您繪製您自己的項目。The property, , and also help you draw your own items. 除了顯示和選取的功能，也提供功能，可讓您有效率地將項目加入並找出清單的項目內的文字。In addition to display and selection functionality, the also provides features that enable you to efficiently add items to the and to find text within the items of the list. 和方法可讓您新增的項目大量不用每次重繪控制項項目加入至清單。The and methods enable you to add a large number of items to the without the control being repainted each time an item is added to the list. 和方法可讓您搜尋包含特定的搜尋字串的清單中的項目。The and methods enable you to search for an item in the list that contains a specific search string. ， ，和屬性提供的存取權由三個集合。The , , and properties provide access to the three collections that are used by the . 下表概述所使用的三個集合和其控制項中的使用。The following table outlines the three collections used by the and their use within the control. |集合類別Collection class|使用中 Use within the | |----------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| ||包含所包含的所有項目控制項。Contains all items contained in the control.| ||包含集合選取的項目，其中包含的項目子集在控制項。Contains a collection of the selected items which is a subset of the items contained in the control.| ||包含一組選取的索引，這是索引的子集的。Contains a collection of the selected indexes, which is a subset of the indexes of the . 這些索引指定已選取項目。These indexes specify items that are selected.| 下列三個範例顯示三個索引的集合，類別支援。The following three examples show the three indexed collections that the class supports. 下表顯示如何的範例儲存的項目以及其中的選取狀態範例。The following table shows an example of how the stores the items of the as well as their selection state within an example . |索引Index|項目Item|在清單方塊中選取狀態Selection state within the ListBox| |-----------|----------|----------------------------------------| |00|object1object1|未選取Unselected| |11|object2object2|已選取Selected| |22|object3object3|未選取Unselected| |33|object4object4|已選取Selected| |44|object5object5|已選取Selected| 根據，如上表所示，此表格顯示如何會出現。Based on the shown in the previous table, this table shows how the would appear. |索引Index|項目Item| |-----------|----------| |00|object2object2| |11|object4object4| |22|object5object5| 根據，如上表所示，此表格顯示如何會出現。Based on the shown in the previous table, this table shows how the would appear. |索引Index|項目的索引Index of item| |-----------|-------------------| |00|11| |11|33| |22|44| 方法類別可讓您將項目加入。The method of the class enables you to add items to the . 加入成員時，方法可以接受任何物件。The method can accept any object when adding a member to the . 當物件新增至，此控制項會使用中定義的文字物件的方法除非此物件內的成員名稱會指定於屬性。When an object is being added to the , the control uses the text defined in the method of the object unless a member name within the object is specified in the property. 除了使用加入項目方法類別，您也可以新增項目使用屬性類別。In addition to adding items using the method of the class you can also add items using the property of the class. > [!NOTE] > 如果您有， ，或基底 Windows form 並想来修改這些控制項衍生的 Windows form 中的字串集合，基底的 Windows form 中的這些控制項的字串集合必須是空白。If you have a , , or on a base Windows form and want to modify the string collections of those controls in a derived Windows form, the string collections of those controls in the base Windows form must be empty. 如果字串集合不是空的它們會變成唯讀時衍生另一個 Windows form。If the string collections are not empty, they become read-only when you derive another Windows form. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立控制項資料行中顯示多個項目，可以有多個控制項的清單中選取的項目。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control that displays multiple items in columns and can have more than one item selected in the control's list. 如需範例程式碼會加入到 50 個項目使用方法類別，然後再選取三個項目從清單中使用方法。The code for the example adds 50 items to the using the method of the class and then selects three items from the list using the method. 然後程式碼會顯示的值從集合，到屬性，而，到屬性。The code then displays values from the collection, through the property, and the , through the property. 這個範例需要是位於該程式碼，並從呼叫。This example requires that the code is located in and called from a . summary.span: 藉由在呼叫 方法之前防止繪製控制項，便可在每次將項目加入至 的同時維持效能。

span.span: Maintains performance while items are added to the one at a time by preventing the control from drawing until the method is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新增多個項目，最好是使用方法類別 (透過屬性)。The preferred way to add multiple items to the is to use the method of the class (through the property of the ). 這可讓您將項目陣列加入至單一作業中的清單。This enables you to add an array of items to the list in a single operation. 不過，如果您想要加入的項目一於使用方法類別，您可以使用方法，以防止重繪控制項每個項目新增至清單的時間。However, if you want to add items one at a time using the method of the class, you can use the method to prevent the control from repainting the each time an item is added to the list. 完成的工作項目加入清單後，請呼叫方法，以啟用來重新繪製。Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the method to enable the to repaint. 加入項目可以防止這種 flickered 繪圖的當正在大量項目加入至清單。This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the when a large number of items are being added to the list. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用和方法時加入五千項目至。The following code example uses the and methods while adding five thousand items to a . 這個範例需要控制項，名為`listBox1`，已新增至並放置在表單內和從它呼叫這個方法。This example requires that a control, named `listBox1`, has been added to a and that this method is placed within the form and called from it. [!code-cpp[Classic ListBox.BeginUpdate Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ListBox.BeginUpdate Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ListBox.BeginUpdate Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ListBox.BeginUpdate Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ListBox.BeginUpdate Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ListBox.BeginUpdate Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取消選取 中的所有項目。

span.span: Unselects all items in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法相當於設定為負一 (-1) 的屬性。Calling this method is equivalent to setting the property to negative one (-1). 若要快速地取消選取清單中的所有項目，您可以使用這個方法。You can use this method to quickly unselect all items in the list. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性屬性，以將目前選取的項目移至的顯示區域中的項目清單的頂端。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property with the property to move the currently selected item to the top of the list of items in the display area of the . 進一步的範例將示範如何移除項目使用方法類別，以及如何清除所有項目選取項目使用方法。The example further demonstrates how to remove items using the method of the class, and how to clear all item selection using the method. 程式碼第一次將目前選取的項目到清單頂端。The code first moves the currently selected item in the to the top of the list. 此程式碼再移除目前選取的項目之前的所有項目，並清除所有選取項目中的。The code then removes all items before the currently selected item and clears all selections in the . 這個範例需要包含的項目已加入至表單和中，項目目前已選取。This example requires that a containing items is added to a form and that an item is currently selected in the . [!code-cpp[ListBox.SelectedIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.SelectedIndex/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListBox.SelectedIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.SelectedIndex/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListBox.SelectedIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.SelectedIndex/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您將值設定為零 (0) 時，預設寬度被指派給每個資料行。If you set the value to zero (0), a default width is assigned to each column. 如果是多重資料行，這個屬性傳回的清單中的每個資料行的目前寬度。If the is a multicolumn , this property returns the current width of each column in the list. 您可以使用這個屬性，以確保每個資料行中的多重資料行可正確顯示其項目。You can use this property to ensure that each column in a multicolumn can properly display its items. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範簡單兩欄。The following code example demonstrates a simple two-column . MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DrawItem As DrawItemEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於主控描繪 的視覺外觀變更時。

span.span: Occurs when a visual aspect of an owner-drawn changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件由描繪。This event is used by an owner-drawn . 此事件，才引發的時機屬性設定為`DrawMode.OwnerDrawFixed`或`DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`。The event is only raised when the property is set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawFixed` or `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`. 您可以使用這個事件來執行繪製項目所需的工作。You can use this event to perform the tasks needed to draw items in the . 如果您有可變動大小的項目 (當屬性設定為`DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`)，繪製項目之前,就會引發事件。If you have a variable-sized item (when the property is set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`), before drawing an item, the event is raised. 您可以建立事件處理常式事件，以指定要繪製的事件處理常式中的項目大小事件。You can create an event handler for the event to specify the size for the item that you are going to draw in your event handler for the event. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立主控描繪項目。The following code example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn items. 程式碼會使用屬性，指定繪製的項目固定的大小和事件以執行每個項目至繪圖。The code uses the property to specify that the items drawn are fixed sized and the event to perform the drawing of each item into the . 範例程式碼使用的屬性和方法的類別當做參數傳遞至事件處理常式繪製項目。The example code uses the properties and methods of the class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items. 這個範例需要控制項稱為`listBox1`已新增至表單，而且事件由範例程式碼中定義的事件處理常式。This example requires that a control called `listBox1` has been added to a form and that the event is handled by the event handler defined in the example code. 這個範例也會需要的項目已加入至以 「 Apple 」、 「 橙色 」，和"梅紅"文字的順序。The example also requires that items have been added to the with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum" in that order. remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立主控描繪項目。The following code example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn items. 程式碼會使用屬性，指定繪製的項目固定的大小和事件以執行每個項目至繪圖。The code uses the property to specify that the items drawn are fixed sized and the event to perform the drawing of each item into the . 範例程式碼使用的屬性和方法的類別當做參數傳遞至事件處理常式繪製項目。The example code uses the properties and methods of the class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items. 這個範例需要控制項稱為`listBox1`已新增至表單，而且事件由範例程式碼中定義的事件處理常式。This example requires that a control called `listBox1` has been added to a form and that the event is handled by the event handler defined in the example code. 這個範例也會需要的項目已加入至以 「 Apple 」、 「 橙色 」，和"梅紅"文字的順序。The example also requires that items have been added to the with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum" in that order. remarks.format: ## Remarks 將項目加入，最好是使用方法類別 (透過屬性)。The preferred way to add items to the is to use the method of the class (through the property of the ). 這可讓您一次加入清單的項目陣列。This enables you to add an array of items to the list at one time. 不過，如果您想要加入的項目一於使用方法類別，您可以使用方法，以防止重繪控制項每個項目新增至清單的時間。However, if you want to add items one at a time using the method of the class, you can use the method to prevent the control from repainting the each time an item is added to the list. 完成的工作項目加入清單後，請呼叫方法，以啟用來重新繪製。Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the method to enable the to repaint. 加入項目可以防止這種 flickered 繪圖的當正在大量項目加入至清單。This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the when a large number of items are being added to the list. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用和方法時加入五千項目至。The following code example uses the and methods while adding five thousand items to a . 這個範例需要控制項，名為`listBox1`，已新增至並放置在表單內和從它呼叫這個方法。This example requires that a control, named `listBox1`, has been added to a and that this method is placed within the form and called from it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所執行的搜尋不區分大小寫。The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive. 搜尋會尋找的文字部分符合指定的搜尋字串參數， `s`。The search looks for words that partially match the specified search string parameter, `s`. 您可以使用這個方法來搜尋符合指定之字串的第一個項目。You can use this method to search for the first item that matches the specified string. 然後，您可以執行工作，例如移除包含使用的搜尋文字的項目方法或變更項目的文字。You can then perform tasks such as removing the item that contains the search text by using the method or changing the item's text. 一旦找到指定的文字，如果您想要搜尋的文字中的其他執行個體，您可以使用的版本方法提供的參數指定內的起始索引。Once you have found the specified text, if you want to search for other instances of the text in the , you can use the version of the method that provides a parameter for specifying a starting index within the . 如果您想要執行精確的字詞相符而不是在部分符合的搜尋，使用方法。If you want to perform a search for an exact word match instead of a partial match, use the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來搜尋字串中的第一個執行個體。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to search for the first instance of a string in a . 如果沒有項目會找到符合的搜尋字串傳回-1 值和範例顯示。If no items are found that match the search string returns a -1 value and the example displays a . 如果找到符合搜尋文字項目，此範例會使用方法，以選取的項目。If an item is found that matches the search text, the example uses the method to select the item in the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性設定為`true`，控制項會自動調整大小以確保不部分顯示項目。When this property is set to `true`, the control automatically resizes to ensure that an item is not partially displayed. 如果您想要維護的原始大小根據表單的空間需求，將此屬性設定為`false`。If you want to maintain the original size of the based on the space requirements of your form, set this property to `false`. 根據預設，和大小會使其只顯示整個項目。By default, the and the sizes are such that they show only whole items. 如果您想或完全填滿停駐的區域，設定至`false`。If you want the or to completely fill a docked area, set to `false`. 這會讓控制項完全填滿區域中，但沒有充分顯示最後一個項目。This causes the control to completely fill the area, but the last item is not fully displayed. 如果不包含任何項目，這個屬性沒有任何作用。If the does not contain any items, this property has no effect. > [!NOTE] > 整數類資料的高度為基礎的高度，而不是工作區高度。The integral height is based on the height of the , rather than the client area height. 如此一來，當屬性設定`true`，項目仍可以部分顯示才顯示捲軸。As a result, when the property is set `true`, items can still be partially shown if scroll bars are displayed. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性設定為`DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`，此屬性沒有任何作用。If the property is set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`, this property has no effect. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用和屬性，以顯示顯示中的所有項目文字的水平捲軸控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and properties to display a horizontal scroll bar that shows all item text in the control. 此範例也會使用屬性，以確認的項目不會部分顯示的大小因控制項。The example also uses the property to ensure that items are not partially displayed due to the size of the control. 這個範例需要控制項，名為`listBox1`，已新增至表單。This example requires that a control, named `listBox1`, has been added to a form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性可讓您取得的目前儲存在中的項目清單的參考。This property enables you to obtain a reference to the list of items that are currently stored in the . 與這個參考中，您可以將項目加入、 移除項目，並取得集合中的項目計數。With this reference, you can add items, remove items, and obtain a count of the items in the collection. 如需可以執行與項目集合之工作的詳細資訊，請參閱類別參考主題。For more information about the tasks that can be performed with the item collection, see the class reference topics. 您也可以管理的項目使用屬性。You can also manipulate the items of a by using the property. 如果您使用屬性加入項目到，您可以檢視中的項目使用屬性，但是您無法加入或移除的方法清單中的項目。If you use the property to add items to a , you can view the items in the using the property but you cannot add or remove items from the list using the methods of the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立控制項資料行中顯示多個項目，可以有多個控制項的清單中選取的項目。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control that displays multiple items in columns and can have more than one item selected in the control's list. 如需範例程式碼會加入到 50 個項目使用方法類別，然後再選取三個項目從清單中使用方法。The code for the example adds 50 items to the using the method of the class and then selects three items from the list using the method. 然後程式碼會顯示的值從集合 (透過屬性) 和(透過屬性)。The code then displays values from the collection (through the property) and the (through the property). 這個範例需要是位於該程式碼，並從呼叫。This example requires that the code is located in and called from a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出是否永遠顯示垂直捲軸，即使中的項目數不需要顯示垂直捲軸。The property indicates whether a vertical scroll bar is always displayed, even if the number of items in the does not require displaying the vertical scroll bar. 根據預設，只會有足夠的項目，來保證作業顯示時顯示垂直捲軸。By default, a only shows a vertical scroll bar when there are enough items to warrant displaying. 多重資料行的、屬性會指出水平捲軸會顯示。For a multicolumn , the property indicates that a horizontal scroll bar is displayed. 垂直捲軸永遠不會顯示這個屬性的值為何的多重資料行。A vertical scroll bar is never displayed regardless of the value of this property for a multicolumn . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範描繪藉由設定屬性`OwnerDrawVariable`值和處理和事件。The following code example demonstrates an owner-drawn by setting the property to the `OwnerDrawVariable` value and handling the and events. 它也會示範設定和屬性，而且使用方法。It also demonstrates setting the and properties and using the method. 若要執行此範例中，將它貼入中匯入的空白表單命名空間和命名空間。To run this example, paste it in an empty form that imports the namespace and the namespace. 呼叫`InitializeOwnerDrawnListBox`從表單的建構函式或事件處理方法。Call `InitializeOwnerDrawnListBox` from the form's constructor or event-handling method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 標準，您可以使用這個屬性決定索引中選取的項目。For a standard , you can use this property to determine the index of the item that is selected in the . 如果屬性會設為`SelectionMode.MultiSimple`或`SelectionMode.MultiExtended`(表示多重選擇) 並在清單中選取多個項目，這個屬性可以傳回任何選取的項目索引。If the property of the is set to either `SelectionMode.MultiSimple` or `SelectionMode.MultiExtended` (which indicates a multiple-selection ) and multiple items are selected in the list, this property can return the index to any selected item. 若要擷取集合，其中包含的所有索引選取的項目在多重選擇，使用屬性。To retrieve a collection containing the indexes of all selected items in a multiple-selection , use the property. 如果您想要取得中目前選取的項目，使用屬性。If you want to obtain the item that is currently selected in the , use the property. 此外，您可以使用屬性，以取得多個選取範圍中所有選取的項目。In addition, you can use the property to obtain all the selected items in a multiple-selection . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性屬性，以將目前選取的項目移至的顯示區域中的項目清單的頂端。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property with the property to move the currently selected item to the top of the list of items in the display area of the . 進一步的範例將示範如何移除項目使用方法類別，以及如何清除所有項目選取項目使用方法。The example further demonstrates how to remove items using the method of the class, and how to clear all item selection using the method. 程式碼第一次將目前選取的項目到清單頂端。The code first moves the currently selected item in the to the top of the list. 此程式碼再移除目前選取的項目之前的所有項目，並清除所有選取項目中的。The code then removes all items before the currently selected item and clears all selections in the . 這個範例需要包含的項目已加入至表單和中，項目目前已選取。This example requires that a containing items is added to a form and that an item is currently selected in the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以建立此事件，以判斷何時的事件處理常式中選取的索引已變更。You can create an event handler for this event to determine when the selected index in the has been changed. 這有助於進行您需要根據目前的選取範圍中其他控制項中顯示資訊。This can be useful when you need to display information in other controls based on the current selection in the . 您可以使用此事件的事件處理常式載入其他控制項中的資訊。You can use the event handler for this event to load the information in the other controls. 如果屬性設定為或，對任何變更集合，包括項目移除選取範圍，會引發這個事件。If the property is set to or , any change to the collection, including removing an item from the selection, will raise this event. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來搜尋和選取的項目以不同事件控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to search for and select an item in a different control. 此範例會使用事件，以判斷何時在選取的項目變更。The example uses the event to determine when the selected item in the is changed. 範例程式碼接著會讀取項目使用的文字屬性和呼叫方法的不同使用傳回的文字在第一個。The example code then reads the text of the item using the property and calls the method on a different using the text returned by in the first . 如果項目位於另，在選取的項目。If an item is found in the other , the item is selected. 這個範例需要有兩個控制項，名為`listBox1`和`listBox2`，已新增至表單，同時控制項包含完全相同的項目。This example requires that two controls, named `listBox1` and `listBox2`, have been added to a form and that both controls contain items that are identical. 這個範例也需要在此範例中定義的事件處理方法連接到事件`listBox1`。The example also requires that the event-handling method defined in the example is connected to the event of `listBox1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 多個選取項目的，這個屬性會傳回集合，其中包含所有的項目中選取索引。For a multiple-selection , this property returns a collection containing the indexes to all items that are selected in the . 針對單一選取，這個屬性會傳回集合，其中包含單一項目包含只有在選取之項目的索引。For a single-selection , this property returns a collection containing a single element containing the index of the only selected item in the . 如需如何管理集合的項目，請參閱。For more information about how to manipulate the items of the collection, see . 類別提供數種方式來參考選取的項目。The class provides a number of ways to reference selected items. 而不是使用屬性來取得目前選取之項目的索引位置，在單一選取，您可以使用屬性。Instead of using the property to obtain the index position of the currently selected item in a single-selection , you can use the property. 如果您想要取得中目前選取的項目，而不是項目的索引位置，使用屬性。If you want to obtain the item that is currently selected in the , instead of the index position of the item, use the property. 此外，您可以使用屬性，如果您想要取得多個選取範圍中所有選取的項目。In addition, you can use the property if you want to obtain all the selected items in a multiple-selection . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來搜尋的項目中的搜尋文字的所有執行個體。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to search for all instances of the search text in the items of the . 此範例會使用新版方法可讓您指定要從中進行持續的所有項目中搜尋的開始搜尋索引。The example uses the version of the method that enables you to specify a starting search index from which to do a continual search of all items in the . 此範例也示範如何判斷何時方法開始之後的項目，以避免遞迴搜尋清單的底部，從清單的頂端搜尋。The example also demonstrates how to determine when the method begins searching from the top of the list after it reaches the bottom of the list of items to prevent a recursive search. 一旦項目存在於，它們會選取使用方法。Once items are found in the , they are selected using the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 標準，您可以使用這個屬性來判斷哪一個項目中選取。For a standard , you can use this property to determine which item is selected in the . 如果屬性會設為`SelectionMode.MultiSimple`或`SelectionMode.MultiExtended`(表示多重選擇) 並在清單中選取多個項目，這個屬性可以傳回任何選取的項目。If the property of the is set to either `SelectionMode.MultiSimple` or `SelectionMode.MultiExtended` (which indicates a multiple-selection ) and multiple items are selected in the list, this property can return any selected item. 若要擷取集合，其中包含多個選取範圍中所有選取的項目，使用屬性。To retrieve a collection containing all selected items in a multiple-selection , use the property. 如果您想要取得目前選取的項目中的索引位置，使用屬性。If you want to obtain the index position of the currently selected item in the , use the property. 此外，您可以使用屬性，以取得所有選取的索引，在多重選擇。In addition, you can use the property to obtain all the selected indexes in a multiple-selection . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來搜尋和選取的項目以不同事件控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to search for and select an item in a different control. 此範例會使用事件，以判斷何時在選取的項目變更。The example uses the event to determine when the selected item in the is changed. 範例程式碼接著會讀取項目使用的文字屬性和呼叫方法的不同使用傳回的文字在第一個。The example code then reads the text of the item using the property and calls the method on a different using the text returned by in the first . 如果項目位於另，在選取的項目。If an item is found in the other , the item is selected. 這個範例需要有兩個控制項，名為`listBox1`和`listBox2`，已新增至表單，同時控制項包含完全相同的項目。This example requires that two controls, named `listBox1` and `listBox2`, have been added to a form and that both controls contain items that are identical. 這個範例也需要在此範例中定義的事件處理方法連接到事件`listBox1`。The example also requires that the event-handling method defined in the example is connected to the event of `listBox1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您判斷在項目數目使用者可以選取一次，以及使用者如何進行多重選取。The property enables you to determine how many items in the a user can select at one time and how the user can make multiple-selections. 當屬性設定為`SelectionMode.MultiExtended`、 按住 shift 鍵並按一下滑鼠按鈕或按 SHIFT 和方向鍵 （向上、 向下鍵、 向左鍵和向右箭號） 的其中一個延伸選取範圍從先前選取的項目到目前的項目.When the property is set to `SelectionMode.MultiExtended`, pressing SHIFT and clicking the mouse or pressing SHIFT and one of the arrow keys (UP ARROW, DOWN ARROW, LEFT ARROW, and RIGHT ARROW) extends the selection from the previously selected item to the current item. 按住 CTRL 並按一下滑鼠選取，或取消選取清單中的項目。Pressing CTRL and clicking the mouse selects or deselects an item in the list. 當屬性設定為`SelectionMode.MultiSimple`、 按一下滑鼠或按下空格鍵選取或取消選取清單中的項目。When the property is set to `SelectionMode.MultiSimple`, a mouse click or pressing the SPACEBAR selects or deselects an item in the list. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來判斷哪些項目中都選取，才能選擇未選取的項目並取消選取 已選取的項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to determine which items in a are selected in order to select the items that are not selected and deselect the items that are selected. 此範例也示範如何使用屬性來啟用有多個選取項目，並使用屬性來示範如何排序的項目自動。The example also demonstrates using the property to enable a to have more than one selected item and uses the property to demonstrate how to sort items in a automatically. 這個範例需要具名`listBox1`，已新增至表單，而且`InitializeMyListBox`範例中定義的方法從呼叫表單的事件。This example requires that a , named `listBox1`, has been added to a form and that the `InitializeMyListBox` method defined in the example is called from the event of the form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 高度控制項增加和減少的屬性。The height of the control increases and decreases by a multiple of the property. 高度是否不是倍數的數字，高度會變更的最大的多個，小於高度。If height is a number that is not a multiple of , the height of the will change by the largest multiple that is less than height. 一般而言，對應到不包含在指定的參數繫結的參數傳入其目前值。Typically, the parameters that correspond to the bounds not included in the specified parameter are passed in with their current values. 例如， `height`， `width`，或`x`或`y`屬性屬性可以傳入控制項的目前執行個體的參考。For example, the `height`, `width`, or the `x` or `y` properties of the property can be passed in with a reference to the current instance of the control. 不過，會接受所有傳入的值，而套用至控制項。However, all values passed in are honored and applied to the control. `specified`參數代表控制項的項目變更您的應用程式。The `specified` parameter represents the elements of the controls changed by your application. 例如，如果您變更控制項的`specified`參數值是。For example, if you change the of the control, the `specified` parameter value is . 不過，如果調整以回應屬性設定，`specified`參數值是。However, if the is adjusted in response to the property being set, the `specified` parameter value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用來自動排序屬性依字母順序在字串。Use the property to automatically sort strings alphabetically in a . 當項目新增至排序，項目會移至已排序的清單中的適當位置。As items are added to a sorted , the items are moved to the appropriate location in the sorted list. 當加入項目至，它會先排序的項目，然後再加入新項目更有效率。When adding items to a , it is more efficient to sort the items first and then add new items. A具有其設`true`不會繫結至資料使用屬性。A with its set to `true` should not be bound to data using the property. 顯示已排序資料中繫結至，您應該將繫結至支援排序的資料來源，並有提供排序的資料來源。To display sorted data in a bound , you should bind to a data source that supports sorting and have the data source provide the sorting. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來判斷哪些項目中都選取，才能選擇未選取的項目並取消選取 已選取的項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to determine which items in a are selected in order to select the items that are not selected and deselect the items that are selected. 此範例也示範如何使用屬性來啟用有多個選取項目，並使用屬性來示範如何排序的項目自動。The example also demonstrates using the property to enable a to have more than one selected item and uses the property to demonstrate how to sort items in a automatically. 這個範例需要具名`listBox1`，已新增至表單，而且`InitializeMyListBox`範例中定義的方法從呼叫表單的事件。This example requires that a , named `listBox1`, has been added to a form and that the `InitializeMyListBox` method defined in the example is called from the event of the form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性的值設定為字串值，搜尋中的項目，符合指定的文字和選取的項目。When the value of this property is set to a string value, the searches for the item within the that matches the specified text and selects the item. 您也可以使用這個屬性來判斷中目前所選取的項目。You can also use this property to determine which items are currently selected in the . 如果屬性設`SelectionMode.MultiExtended`，這個屬性會傳回第一個選取之項目的文字。If the property of the is set to `SelectionMode.MultiExtended`, this property returns the text of the first selected item. 如果屬性未設定為`SelectionMode.None`，這個屬性會傳回第一個選取之項目的文字。If the property of the is not set to `SelectionMode.None`, this property returns the text of the first selected item.

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the first visible item in the .

value.span: 控制項中第一個可見項目之以零為起始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of the first visible item in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一開始，索引位置的項目為零 (0) 位於最上層的可見區域。Initially, the item with the index position zero (0) is at the top of the visible region of the . 如果內容有捲動，另一個項目可能會在控制項的顯示區域的頂端。If the contents of the have been scrolled, another item might be at the top of the control's display area. 您可以使用這個屬性來取得內的索引如目前位在控制項的可見區域頂端的項目。You can use this property to obtain the index within the for the of the item that is currently positioned at the top of the visible region of the control. 您也可以使用這個屬性的項目放在清單頂端的控制項的可見區域。You can also use this property to position an item in the list at the top of the visible region of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性屬性，以將目前選取的項目移至的顯示區域中的項目清單的頂端。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property with the property to move the currently selected item to the top of the list of items in the display area of the . 進一步的範例將示範如何移除項目使用方法類別，以及如何清除所有項目選取項目使用方法。The example further demonstrates how to remove items using the method of the class, and how to clear all item selection using the method. 程式碼第一次將目前選取的項目到清單頂端。The code first moves the currently selected item in the to the top of the list. 此程式碼再移除目前選取的項目之前的所有項目，並清除所有選取項目中的。The code then removes all items before the currently selected item and clears all selections in the . 這個範例需要包含的項目已加入至表單和中，項目目前已選取。This example requires that a containing items is added to a form and that an item is currently selected in the .
